medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient presented with abdominal pain 18 months prior to being found to have low serum TBG concentration. The abdominal pain resolved spontaneously, and thyroid function tests were performed as a routine evaluation.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Partial deficiency of thyroxine-binding globulin due to a signal peptide mutation; previous treatment with levothyroxine.
medical_history.family_history: The patient's mother and son were also found to have the H( /H110022)Y mutation.
